inclusion.criterion: All adult surgical patients (>18 yr) with a diagnosis of OSA with or without a CPAP prescription.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Scheduled for a non-cardiac surgery (general surgery, orthopedics, urology, plastic surgery and spine) that is expected to require a postoperative hospital stay of more than one night.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: They are unwilling or unable to give informed consent to the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: They are on supplemental oxygen preoperatively (daytime or nocturnal).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Surgery included tonsillectomy, septoplasty, uvuloplasty, pharyngoplasty, tracheostomy, or prolonged (> 48 hrs) postoperative mechanical ventilation of the lungs is anticipated.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has OSA and is scheduled for non-cardiac surgery with a postoperative hospital stay of more than one night. They are not on supplemental oxygen preoperatively.
